property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Whispering Waves - When this creature enters the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand and the other on top of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Rousing Bellow - When this creature enters the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution creature that is level 4 or less from your hand into the battle zone. That creature gets "Fast Attack" until the end of the turn. At the end of the turn, put it into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Slayer Unweaving - When this creature enters the battle zone, choose target enemy creature. Your opponent shuffles it into his or her deck.
